item.title: Cozy Red Lentil Soup
item.description: Warm up with this cozy red lentil soup that’s packed with flavor and nutrients. Perfect for a comforting meal or a light lunch, this vegan and gluten-free dish can be made in under 30 minutes! | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 30min | Serves: 4 | #cat1761230594885 #easyrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 cup red lentils
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 carrots, diced
  • 2 celery stalks, diced
  • 3 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • 1 teaspoon turmeric
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh parsley for garnish

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
  2. Add onion, carrots, and celery; sauté for about 5 minutes until softened.
  3. Stir in garlic, cumin, and turmeric; cook for another minute until fragrant.
  4. Add red lentils and vegetable broth; bring to a boil.
  5. Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes until lentils are tender.
  6. Season with salt and pepper, and garnish with fresh parsley before serving.

item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 90 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 105 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 6

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 cup wild rice
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 medium onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 cups butternut squash, diced
  • 1 cup mushrooms, sliced
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 teaspoon dried thyme
  • 1 teaspoon sage
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Rinse the wild rice under cold water and set aside.
  2. In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onion and garlic, sauté until translucent.
  3. Add butternut squash and mushrooms, cooking for about 5 minutes until softened.
  4. Stir in the wild rice, vegetable broth, thyme, and sage. Bring to a boil.
  5. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for about 1 hour or until rice is tender.
  6. Season with salt and pepper to taste before serving.

item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 25 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 40 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 4 large potatoes, peeled and diced
  • 2 leeks, cleaned and sliced
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat and add the sliced leeks. Sauté until soft, about 5 minutes.
  2. Add the diced potatoes and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes until potatoes are tender.
  3. Use an immersion blender to puree the soup until smooth. Stir in the heavy cream and season with salt and pepper to taste.

item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound mushrooms, sliced
  • 2 tablespoons butter
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large pot, melt butter over medium heat. Add onions and garlic, sauté until translucent.
  2. Add sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their juices and become tender.
  3. Pour in the vegetable broth and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
  4. Stir in the heavy cream, season with salt and pepper, and blend until smooth.

🥘 Ingredients

  • 4 large potatoes, peeled and diced

  • 4 cups vegetable broth

item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 8

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 cups fresh strawberries, hulled and sliced
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1/4 cup sugar
  • 2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 tablespoon baking powder
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1/4 cup unsalted butter, softened
  • 3/4 cup milk

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
  2. In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar.
  3. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
  4. Stir in milk until just combined.
  5. Turn dough onto a floured surface and knead gently.
  6. Roll out to 1-inch thickness and cut into rounds.
  7. Place on a baking sheet and bake for 15-20 minutes until golden.
  8. While the cakes bake, whip the heavy cream with sugar until soft peaks form.
  9. Once the cakes are cool, slice them in half, layer with strawberries and whipped cream, and serve.

item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 6

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 4 cups apples, peeled and sliced
  • 1 cup rolled oats
  • 1/2 cup brown sugar
  • 1/2 cup all-purpose flour (or gluten-free flour)
  • 1/2 cup vegan butter or regular butter
  • 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
  2. In a large bowl, combine sliced apples, cinnamon, and a bit of brown sugar. Toss to coat.
  3. In another bowl, mix oats, flour, brown sugar, and salt. Cut in the butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
  4. Spread the apple mixture in a baking dish and top with the oat mixture.
  5. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the apples are tender and the topping is golden brown.

⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 35 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 50 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 6

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 6 cups sliced apples
  • 1 cup rolled oats
  • 1 cup all-purpose flour
  • 1 cup brown sugar
  • 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/2 cup unsalted butter, melted

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
  2. In a large bowl, mix sliced apples with cinnamon and place them in a greased baking dish.
  3. In another bowl, combine oats, flour, brown sugar, and melted butter until crumbly.
  4. Spread the oat mixture evenly over the apples.
  5. Bake for 30-35 minutes until the topping is golden brown and the apples are tender.

item.title: Best Pumpkin Bread Recipe
item.description: Indulge in the warmth of homemade pumpkin bread, a moist and flavorful treat that brings the essence of fall to your kitchen. Perfect for breakfast or as a delightful snack, this recipe is sure to become a family favorite. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 60min | Serves: 8 | #cat1761230294638 #easyrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 60 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 75 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 8

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 cup pumpkin puree
  • 1 cup sugar
  • 1/2 cup vegetable oil
  • 2 eggs
  • 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 teaspoon baking soda
  • 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
  • 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a loaf pan.
  2. In a large bowl, mix together the pumpkin puree, sugar, and vegetable oil until well combined.
  3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
  4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
  5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the pumpkin mixture, stirring until just combined.
  6. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan and smooth the top.
  7. Bake for 60 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
  8. Let the bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

item.description: Indulge in the cozy flavors of fall with this irresistibly moist pumpkin bread topped with a crunchy streusel. Perfect for crisp autumn days, it fills your kitchen with a warm, inviting aroma that makes every slice a heavenly treat. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 60min | Serves: 1 | #cat1761230294638 #mediumrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 60 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 75 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 1

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 cups pumpkin puree
  • 1 cup sugar
  • 1/2 cup vegetable oil
  • 2 large eggs
  • 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 teaspoon baking soda
  • 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
  • 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt
  • 1/2 cup chopped nuts (optional)
  • 1/2 cup streusel topping

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a loaf pan.
  2. In a large bowl, mix together the pumpkin puree, sugar, vegetable oil, and eggs until well combined.
  3. In another bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
  4. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, stirring until just combined. Fold in the nuts if using.
  5. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan and sprinkle the streusel topping evenly over the top.
  6. Bake for 60 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
  7. Allow to cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.

item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 60 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 75 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 10

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 cups pumpkin puree
  • 1 cup sugar
  • 1/2 cup vegetable oil
  • 4 eggs
  • 2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 teaspoon baking soda
  • 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
  • 1 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 8 ounces cream cheese, softened

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a loaf pan.
  2. In a large bowl, mix pumpkin puree, sugar, and vegetable oil until well combined.
  3. Add eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
  4. In another bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
  5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the pumpkin mixture, stirring until just combined.
  6. Pour half of the batter into the prepared loaf pan.
  7. Spread the softened cream cheese over the batter, then top with the remaining batter.
  8. Bake for 60 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.

item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 2

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 slices of bread
  • 1 cup homemade baked beans
  • 2 tomatoes, halved
  • 1 cup mushrooms, sliced
  • 2 sausages
  • 2 eggs

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Toast the bread until golden brown.
  2. In a skillet, cook the sausages over medium heat until browned.
  3. Add the mushrooms and tomatoes to the skillet, cooking until softened.
  4. Heat the baked beans in a small pot until warmed through.
  5. Fry the eggs to your liking in a separate pan.
  6. Serve everything on a plate, arranging it for a colorful presentation.

item.description: This Creamy Jalapeño Chicken Skillet is a quick and delicious dinner that brings a burst of flavor to your table. With its creamy texture and spicy kick, it's perfect for busy weeknights when you want something satisfying and homemade. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 30min | Serves: 4 | #cat1761230383494 #easyrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound chicken breast, diced
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 cup cream cheese
  • 1/2 cup jalapeños, diced
  • 1 cup chicken broth
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh cilantro for garnish

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
  2. Add diced chicken and season with salt, pepper, and garlic powder. Cook until browned.
  3. Stir in jalapeños and cook for another 2 minutes.
  4. Add cream cheese and chicken broth, stirring until creamy and well combined.
  5. Simmer for 5-10 minutes until the sauce thickens.
  6. Garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.

item.title: Sufganiyot (Jelly Doughnuts)
item.description: Indulge in the sweet, fluffy delight of Sufganiyot, the perfect treat for any occasion. These jelly-filled doughnuts are a festive favorite that will bring joy to your table and smiles to your loved ones. | ⏱️ Prep: 120min | Cook: 10min | Serves: 12 | #cat1761229712965 #mediumrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 120 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 10 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 130 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 12

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 3 1/2 cups flour
  • 1/4 cup sugar
  • 2 1/4 tsp active dry yeast
  • 3/4 cup warm milk
  • 2 eggs
  • 1/4 cup butter, melted
  • Jelly or jam for filling
  • Powdered sugar for dusting
  • Oil for frying

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Mix yeast with warm milk and sugar, let foam for 10 minutes.
  2. Add flour, eggs, and melted butter; knead until smooth.
  3. Let dough rise for 1 hour until doubled in size.
  4. Roll out dough and cut into circles; let rise for another 30 minutes.
  5. Deep fry at 350°F (175°C) until golden, about 2-3 minutes per side.
  6. Cool, then inject with jelly using a piping bag.
  7. Dust generously with powdered sugar before serving.

item.title: Chili Colorado
item.description: Experience the rich and vibrant flavors of traditional Mexican Chili Colorado, a hearty dish that brings warmth and comfort to any table. This slow-cooked delight features tender beef simmered in a luscious red chili sauce, perfect for sharing with family and friends. | ⏱️ Prep: 25min | Cook: 40min | Serves: 8 | #cat1761229889885 #mediumrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 25 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 40 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 65 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 8

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 6 ancho chili peppers, stemmed and seeded
  • 6 guajillo peppers, stemmed and seeded
  • 2 pasilla peppers, stemmed and seeded
  • 3 chiles de arbol, stemmed and seeded
  • 1 tablespoon Mexican oregano
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 small onion, chopped
  • 2 jalapeno peppers, chopped (optional)
  • 4-5 cloves garlic, chopped
  • 2.5 pounds beef chuck roast, cut into bite-sized chunks
  • ¼ cup flour
  • 2 cups beef stock
  • Crumbly white cheese, fresh herbs, spicy chili flakes, lime juice for serving
  • Rice and/or warmed tortillas for serving

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Make the sauce first by dry toasting the dried peppers in a pan for about a minute per side, until the skins blister a bit. Set them into a bowl and cover with hot water for 20 minutes, until they are very soft.
  2. Transfer the peppers to a blender with oregano, cumin, a bit of salt and pepper, and 1 cup of the soaking water. Blend until nice and smooth. Strain the sauce and set aside.
  3. Heat the olive oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Toss the cubed chuck roast in the flour with a bit of salt and pepper to coat them. Brown the beef on all sides, about 5 minutes. Remove to a plate and set aside.
  4. Reduce the heat to medium. Add the onion and peppers and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute, stirring occasionally.
  5. Add the red chili sauce and stock to the pot and bring to a boil. Add the browned meat back to the pot. Reduce the heat, cover, and simmer for at least 30 minutes to let the flavors develop. For melt-in-your-mouth tender beef, simmer for 2 hours or more.
  6. If you’d like to thicken the chili, remove the cover and increase the heat. Cook until the moisture cooks out and your preferred thickness is achieved.

item.title: Best Chili
item.description: This chili recipe is a game changer with tender, fall-apart shredded beef and a unique touch of Mexican Masa Harina. The aroma alone will have your mouth watering and your guests begging for the recipe. | ⏱️ Prep: 30min | Cook: 480min | Serves: 12 | #cat1761230383494 #mediumrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 30 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 480 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 510 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 12

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 pounds beef chuck roast, shredded
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 onion, diced
  • 4 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 cans diced tomatoes
  • 2 cans kidney beans, drained
  • 2 tablespoons chili powder
  • 1 tablespoon cumin
  • 1 cup beef broth
  • 1/2 cup Masa Harina
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add diced onion and minced garlic, sauté until translucent.
  2. Add the shredded beef and cook until browned.
  3. Stir in diced tomatoes, kidney beans, chili powder, cumin, and beef broth. Bring to a simmer.
  4. Cover and let simmer for 8 hours, stirring occasionally.
  5. In the last hour, mix Masa Harina with a little water to create a slurry and stir it into the chili to thicken.
  6. Season with salt and pepper to taste before serving.

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound lean ground turkey
  • 1 can (15 oz) kidney beans, drained and rinsed

  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 tablespoons chili powder

  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add chopped onion and garlic, sauté until softened.
  2. Add ground turkey to the pot, cooking until browned.
  3. Stir in chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper, mixing well.
  4. Add kidney beans, black beans, and crushed tomatoes. Bring to a simmer.
  5. Reduce heat and let chili cook for 30-40 minutes, stirring occasionally.
